io.smudgr.util.source

Interface Source

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimatedSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DepthSource, Gif, GraphSource, Image, KinectSource, Smudge, SourceSet, Video, VideoSource

    public interface Source
    The Source interface defines methods for interacting with a Frame input source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Dispose of this Source, its frames, and any allocated resources.
      Frame getFrame()
      Gets the current Frame of this Source
      default SourceLibrary getSourceLibrary()
      Gets the current application instance SourceLibrary
      void init()
      Initialize the Source
      void update()
      Update the source in time with the application thread.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize the Source

      • update

        void update()
        Update the source in time with the application thread.

        Advance timed frames using this method.

        Gets the current Frame of this Source
